Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables

Class ViewableFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables.ViewableFactory
public class ViewableFactory extends Object
Class responsible for the creation of viewables and for their census.

    • update

      public void update​(int player, ViewableId id, int[] update)
      Updates the specified viewable with the specified int array.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who owns the viewable
      id - Id of the viewable
      update - New values to insert to the viewable
